name: A Mile In His Shoes - a TCE2 fangame
name_original: A Mile In His Shoes - a TCE2 fangame
description:
A Mile In His Shoes is a short unofficial fangame for The Caligula Effect 2 created for Only One of Any Asset Jam 2022. It is recommended that you only play this after completing The Caligula Effect 2 and Gin Noto's Character Episodes, as there several references to story spoilers.

There are two choices and three endings in total.

Team:

  • Writing by wildboar
  • Character Art by Puppet3

Resources:

  • Background Art by Rachel Chen
  • Music from sougetsu-on
  • SFX from orangefreesound

Please note: the web version of the game is built on Ren'Py 7.5 while the standalone download versions are built on Ren'Py 8. If slight lag occurs in the web version when text is being displayed on screen, please go to the Preferences screen and set your text speed to max in order to reduce lag. If this does not fix the issue, please download the version that corresponds to your OS.
